reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Could improve on office hours availability.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Makes complex topics easy to understand. Always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but lectures can be dry. Assignments are challenging.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and helpful practice problems. Sometimes moves too quickly.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Lab sessions are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are disorganized. Grading seems inconsistent.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts. Encourages class discussions. Heavy workload.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Creates a welcoming classroom environment.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex concepts. Could provide more real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips to museums were fantastic.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Seems biased in lectures. Grading criteria are unclear.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging lectures with relevant current events. Group projects were challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics but can be hard to follow. More structure in discussions would help.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and teacher. Makes complex topics accessible. Inspiring mentor.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Could improve on feedback for assignments.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures. Creates a supportive learning environment. Always available for help.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Explains concepts well but moves too fast. More practice problems would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Engaging storyteller. Field work opportunities were valuable. Heavy reading load.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Passionate and inspiring. Makes theory accessible and fun. Great at providing individual feedback.
